snippet: People who found temporary shelter at the High School of Graphic Communication Arts were on the move again as the school prepared to reopen to students.
abstract: People who found temporary shelter at the High School of Graphic Communication Arts  in Manhattan in the aftermath of Hurricane Sandy are being sent to a grab bag of other shelters around the city as the school prepares to reopen for students.
lead_paragraph: People who found temporary shelter at the High School of Graphic Communication Arts were on the move again as the school prepared to reopen to students.

headline.seo: Some Hurricane Sandy Evacuees Are Set Adrift Again
headline.main: As Students Move Back In, Some Evacuees Are Set Adrift Again
headline.print_headline: As Students Move Back In, Some Evacuees Are Set Adrift Again

keywords.value: High School of Graphic Communication Arts
